english.segment1: All your pain. Will be made mine. All your troubles. The tears you cry
english.segment2: Give it up. All that binds. I will place it on my shoulders. And up this hill Ill climb
english.segment3: Father, give me strength. I know there is no other way
english.segment4: I lay down my life for you. This is the moment when all will be made new. I know that you dont understand. But this is part of a greater plan. So I lay down my life for you
english.segment5: This is love. That had to bleed. To bring you mercy. To set you free
english.segment6: You are mine. I am yours. And I will wear your burdens. Just like this crown of thorns
english.segment7: I will take your place. I know there is no other way
english.segment8: I lay down my life for you. This is the moment when all will be made new. I know that you dont understand. But this is part of a greater plan. So I lay down my life for you
english.segment9: Give me all your pride. Give me all your fears. Give me all your secrets. Give me all your tears
english.segment10: Give me all you doubt. Give me all your shame. Watch them wash away. Watch them wash away
english.segment11: Give me all your pride. Give me all your fears. Give me all your secrets. Give me all your tears
english.segment12: Give me all you doubt. Give me all your shame. Watch them wash away. In Jesus name
english.segment13: I lay down my life for you. This is the moment when all will be made new. I know that you dont understand. But this is part of a greater plan. So I lay down my life for you
english.segment14: Though I know that you dont understand. These scars are part of a greater plan. And I lay down my life for you
english.segment15: Arms stretched out. Upon this tree. To show true love. To set you free
